responseFormats.prompt: Your response needs to be in rich text format
Your response needs to be in Markdown format
Your response needs to be returned as multiple lines of text
Your response should be pure PHP code with documentation comments if relevant, and avoid completly markdown format
Your response needs to be pure code in Javascript
Your response needs to be entered as a single line of text

Your response needs to use this grammar : root   ::= object

object ::= "{" ws ( string ":" ws value ("," ws string ":" ws value)* )? "}"

value  ::= object | array | string | number | ("true" | "false" | "null") ws

array  ::= "[" ws ( value ("," ws value)* )? "]" ws

string ::= "\"" ( [a-zA-Z0-9] )* "\"" ws

number ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) ("." [0-9]+)? ([eE] [-+]? [0-9]+)? ws

ws ::= ([ \t\n] ws)?

__construct.name: __construct

doc.description: Constructor.
Ai constructor.

throws.description: If OpenAI key is not defined

__construct.comments:
/**
   * Ai constructor.
   *
   * @param Db $db The database connection
   * @param array $cfg Configuration array for the class
   *
   * @throws Exception If OpenAI key is not defined
   */

getPromptResponse.name: getPromptResponse
getPromptResponse.summary: Gets the AI prompt response based on input, response type, and prompt ID

arguments.name: id_prompt
arguments.description: prompt ID of the AI prompt

doc.description: Gets the AI prompt response based on input, response type, and prompt ID

params.name: $id
params.description: prompt ID of the AI prompt

doc.return: Response array containing success flag and result or error message

getPromptResponse.comments:
/**
   * Gets the AI prompt response based on input, response type, and prompt ID
   *
   * @param string $id_prompt ID of the AI prompt
   * @param string $input Input string
   * @param string $response_type Response type
   * @return array Response array containing success flag and result or error message
   */

insertItem.name: insertItem
insertItem.summary: Inserts an AI prompt item into the database

arguments.name: id_prompt
arguments.description: prompt ID of the AI prompt to insert the item into

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Text of the AI prompt item

arguments.name: ai
arguments.description: AI response of the prompt item

doc.description: Inserts an AI prompt item into the database

params.name: $id
params.description: prompt ID of the AI prompt to insert the item into

params.name: $text
params.description: Text of the AI prompt item

params.name: $ai
params.description: AI response of the prompt item

insertItem.comments:
/**
   * Inserts an AI prompt item into the database
   *
   * @param string $id_prompt ID of the AI prompt to insert the item into
   * @param string $text Text of the AI prompt item
   * @param string $ai AI response of the prompt item
   *
   * @return void
   */

buildPrompt.name: buildPrompt
buildPrompt.summary: Builds the AI prompt based on input, content, prompt, and separator

doc.description: Builds the AI prompt based on input, content, prompt, and separator

buildPrompt.comments:
/**
   * Builds the AI prompt based on input, content, prompt, and separator
   *
   * @param string $input Input string
   * @param string $prompt Prompt string
   * @param string $responseFormat Response format
   * @param string $separator Separator string
   * @return string Built prompt string
   */

getPrompts.summary: Retrieves prompts based on the specified conditions.

arguments.name: private
arguments.description: Determines if private prompts should be included.

params.name: $private
params.description: Determines if private prompts should be included.

doc.return: An array of prompts matching the conditions.

getPrompts.comments:
/**

doc.description: Retrieves a prompt based on the specified shortcode.
doc.return: The prompt data if found, otherwise null.

getPromptByShortcode.comments:

insertPrompt.name: insertPrompt
insertPrompt.summary: Inserts a new prompt into the database.

doc.description: Inserts a new prompt into the database.
doc.return: The ID of the inserted prompt if successful, otherwise null.

insertPrompt.comments:
/**
   * Inserts a new prompt into the database.
   *
   * @param string $title The title of the prompt.
   * @param string $content The content of the prompt.
   * @param string $lang The language of the prompt.
   * @param string $input The input of the prompt.
   * @param string $output The output of the prompt.
   * @param string|null $shortcode The shortcode of the prompt (optional).
   * @return mixed The ID of the inserted prompt if successful, otherwise null.
   */

updatePrompt.name: updatePrompt
updatePrompt.summary: Updates an existing prompt in the database.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the prompt to update.

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: The updated title of the prompt.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The updated content of the prompt.

arguments.name: input
arguments.description: The updated input of the prompt.

arguments.name: output
arguments.description: The updated output of the prompt.

doc.description: Updates an existing prompt in the database.

params.name: $id
params.description: The ID of the prompt to update.

params.name: $title
params.description: The updated title of the prompt.

params.name: $content
params.description: The updated content of the prompt.

params.name: $input
params.description: The updated input of the prompt.

params.name: $output
params.description: The updated output of the prompt.

doc.return: True if the update was successful, false otherwise.

updatePrompt.comments:
/**
   * Updates an existing prompt in the database.
   *
   * @param string $id The ID of the prompt to update.
   * @param string $title The updated title of the prompt.
   * @param string $content The updated content of the prompt.
   * @param string $input The updated input of the prompt.
   * @param string $output The updated output of the prompt.
   * @return bool True if the update was successful, false otherwise.
   */

dbTraitSelection.name: dbTraitSelection
dbTraitSelection.summary: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Offset of the first row to return.

doc.description: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.

params.name: $limit
params.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

params.name: $start
params.description: Offset of the first row to return.

dbTraitSelection.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.
   *
   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.
   * @param array $order Order by conditions.
   * @param int $limit Maximum number of rows to return.
   * @param int $start Offset of the first row to return.
   * @param string $mode The mode of result ('array', 'object', 'value').
   * @param array $fields Fields to select.
   *
   * @return array The result set.
   */

dbTraitGetRequestCfg.name: dbTraitGetRequestCfg

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Offset of the first row to return.

doc.description: Prepares the request configuration for a database query.

params.name: $limit
params.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

params.name: $start
params.description: Offset of the first row to return.

throws.description: If the table index is not defined or a field does not exist.

dbTraitGetRequestCfg.comments:
/**
   * Prepares the request configuration for a database query.
   *
   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.
   * @param array $order Order by conditions.
   * @param int $limit Maximum number of rows to return.
   * @param int $start Offset of the first row to return.
   * @param array $fields Fields to select.
   *
   * @return array The request configuration.
   * @throws Exception If the table index is not defined or a field does not exist.
   */

doc.description: Default Dbconfig configuration for the class
Response formats for the AI

value.prompt: Your response needs to be in rich text format
Your response needs to be in Markdown format
Your response needs to be returned as multiple lines of text
Your response should be pure PHP code with documentation comments if relevant, and avoid completly markdown format
Your response needs to be pure code in Javascript
Your response needs to be entered as a single line of text

Your response needs to use this grammar : root   ::= object

object ::= "{" ws ( string ":" ws value ("," ws string ":" ws value)* )? "}"

value  ::= object | array | string | number | ("true" | "false" | "null") ws

array  ::= "[" ws ( value ("," ws value)* )? "]" ws

string ::= "\"" ( [a-zA-Z0-9] )* "\"" ws

number ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) ("." [0-9]+)? ([eE] [-+]? [0-9]+)? ws

ws ::= ([ \t\n] ws)?

Note instance
@var bool
@var array
@var string
@var string

Your response needs to be entered as a single line of text

Your response needs to use this grammar : root   ::= object

object ::= "{" ws ( string ":" ws value ("," ws string ":" ws value)* )? "}"

value  ::= object | array | string | number | ("true" | "false" | "null") ws

array  ::= "[" ws ( value ("," ws value)* )? "]" ws

string ::= "\"" ( [a-zA-Z0-9] )* "\"" ws

number ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) ("." [0-9]+)? ([eE] [-+]? [0-9]+)? ws

ws ::= ([ \t\n] ws)?
